summary: A giant prehistoric praying mantis, recently freed from the Arctic ice, voraciously preys on American military at the DEW Line and works its way south.
cast: Craig Stevens|William Hopper|Alix Talton|Donald Randolph|Pat Conway|Florenz Ames|Paul Smith|Phil Harvey|Floyd Simmons|Paul Campbell|Helen Jay|Keith Aldrich|William Anders|Frank Baker|Madelon Baker|Chet Brandenburg|George Bruggeman|Marvin Bryan|William Burnside|John Close|Bud Cokes|Tom Cound|Jimmy Dime|Michael Forest|William A. Forester|Rudy Germane|Tom Greenway|Chuck Hamilton|James R. Haskin|Jess Kirkpatrick|James Lanphier|Ned Le Fevre|Harold Lee|George Lynn|Jack Mather|David McMahon|Edward McNally|Marvin Miller|Ernesto Molinari|Dick Paxton|Alan Reynolds|John Roy|Bing Russell|Harry Tyler|Sumner Williams
title: The deadly mantis
